particle_infos.description: Information about the particle effects triggered by this status effect.

buoyancy_sphere_indices.description: The buoyancy sphere indices to use for comparing the threshold.

buoyancy_drag_threshold.description: The threshold of the combined buoyancy sphere dragginess factors before the effect is triggered.

trigger_cooldown.description: The cooldown between splash effect triggers.

node.description: [string]The node/socket used for the position and rotation of the effect as well as determining the trigger based on the dotp threshold.

dotp_threshold.description: The dot product threshold between the forward vector and the velocity before the effect is triggered.
